title: How to Create a Digital Scrapbook

steps.headline: Go to your "My Pictures" folder on your computer.
steps.description: Go through your pictures. Pick out which ones you want to put into your scrapbook.

steps.headline: If you want, download more pictures to the My Pictures folder.
Once you have all the photos you want, go to Microsoft PowerPoint.
From the My Pictures folder, copy and paste the pictures you want into your scrapbook.
steps.description: You can click and drag the photo's edges to make the pictures bigger, smaller, wider, and narrower.

steps.headline: If you want, you can add Video clips.
Be sure to conclude your digital scrapbook with an ending like,
steps.description: "I hope you enjoyed my digital scrapbook!"

steps.headline: Add animation schemes.
steps.description: You can make each slide appear and disappear in cool ways.

steps.headline: Watch the slideshow you have made with Microsoft PowerPoint.
steps.description: You have created an awesome digital scrapbook!

text: Go to your "My Pictures" folder on your computer. Go through your pictures. Pick out which ones you want to put into your scrapbook. If you want, download more pictures to the My Pictures folder.  Once you have all the photos you want, go to Microsoft PowerPoint.  From the My Pictures folder, copy and paste the pictures you want into your scrapbook. You can click and drag the photo's edges to make the pictures bigger, smaller, wider, and narrower. Add Clip Art and decorations.  Add music and sounds.  If you want, you can add Video clips.  Be sure to conclude your digital scrapbook with an ending like, "I hope you enjoyed my digital scrapbook!" Add animation schemes. You can make each slide appear and disappear in cool ways. Watch the slideshow you have made with Microsoft PowerPoint. You have created an awesome digital scrapbook!
sentences: Go to your "My Pictures" folder on your computer.
Pick out which ones you want to put into your scrapbook.
If you want, download more pictures to the My Pictures folder.
Once you have all the photos you want, go to Microsoft PowerPoint.
From the My Pictures folder, copy and paste the pictures you want into your scrapbook.
You can click and drag the photo's edges to make the pictures bigger, smaller, wider, and narrower.
If you want, you can add Video clips.
Be sure to conclude your digital scrapbook with an ending like, "I hope you enjoyed my digital scrapbook!"
You can make each slide appear and disappear in cool ways.
Watch the slideshow you have made with Microsoft PowerPoint.
You have created an awesome digital scrapbook!
tyn_section: A My Pictures folder on your desktop, or a folder of pictures that you have on your computer
